body: @chengh1 Hi thanks for your thinking and PR. Let our committer give a check. @strongduanmu I presume @chengh1 needs some help, could you have a look？

@CreatureOX More than welcome. ;-)
Hi @RaigorJiang could you give a check here?

Hi @tristaZero 
I checked the [document](https://shardingsphere.apache.org/document/current/en/user-manual/shardingsphere-jdbc/usage/sharding/hint/) of current version, and the description does still exist:
> After that, SQL parse and rewrite phase will be skipped and the overall enforcement efficiency can be enhanced.

Hi @CreatureOX 
Welcome to submit a PR to remove the description of the feature. Thank you!
请问后面怎么解决的,我的5.0也是遇到这个问题
Hi @chengh1, can you fix ci error first?
I suggest keeping the 2 construction methods of `ShardingSphereDataSource`, and you can try to merge  `createContextManager`.
Hi @RaigorJiang I've submitted a PR. Should I request for being assigned or just wait PR review?

Test result:
```
shard1=> CREATE ENCRYPT RULE t_encrypt (
COLUMNS(
(NAME=user_id,PLAIN=user_plain,CIPHER=user_cipher,TYPE(NAME=AES,PROPERTIES('aes-key-value'=123456abc))),
(NAME=order_id,CIPHER=order_cipher,TYPE(NAME=MD5))
));

ERROR:  You have an error in your SQL syntax
```

From `RDLStatement.g4`
```
algorithmProperty
    : key=(IDENTIFIER | STRING) EQ value=(NUMBER | INT | STRING)
    ;
```
`value=(NUMBER | INT | STRING)`, `123456abc` does not match. Update it to `'123456abc'` solve it.
@avalon5666 yes,  any good extension points of version 4.1.1?
